mapper.select: SELECT N.NOTI_ID, N.USER_CODE, T.NOTI_CONTENT AS MESSAGE, TO_CHAR(N.CREATED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CREATED_DATE, CASE WHEN C.NOTI_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS IS_READ FROM NOTI N JOIN NOTI_TYPE T ON N.NOTI_TYPE_ID = T.NOTI_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN NOTI_CHECK_LOG C ON N.NOTI_ID = C.NOTI_ID WHERE N.USER_CODE = #{userCode} ORDER BY N.CREATED_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTI_CHECK_LOG(NOTI_CHECK_LOG_ID, NOTI_ID, CHECKED_DATE) SELECT NOTI_CHECK_LOG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, N.NOTI_ID, SYSDATE FROM NOTI N WHERE N.USER_CODE = #{userCode} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM NOTI_CHECK_LOG C WHERE C.NOTI_ID = N.NOTI_ID )
